user.title: Configure INIM Prime
user.description: Enter connection details for your INIM Prime alarm panel.

options.title: INIM Prime Options
options.description: Adjust polling and scan interval settings.

data_description.panel_log_events_fetch_limit: Number of log events fetched per scan when new logs are detected. Default is recommended; the integration will automatically fetch more if needed.

scan_intervals.name: Scan intervals
scan_intervals.description: Controls how often Home Assistant sends API requests to the panel (lower values increase traffic). For details on which entities each interval affects, see the integration README.

data_description.zones_scan_interval: How often Home Assistant sends API requests to fetch zone status.
data_description.partitions_scan_interval: How often Home Assistant sends API requests to fetch partition status.
data_description.gsm_scan_interval: How often Home Assistant sends API requests to fetch GSM status.
data_description.system_faults_scan_interval: How often Home Assistant sends API requests to fetch system faults.
data_description.panel_log_events_scan_interval: How often Home Assistant sends API requests to fetch new panel log events.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure INIM Prime
reconfigure.description: Update your INIM Prime connection settings.

data.api_key: API Key (leave blank to keep current)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the INIM Prime panel.

abort.already_configured: This INIM Prime panel is already configured.
